LOGGER.DESCRIPTION: Creates a log file when program terminates. Stores values from vectors selected below.

ESTIMATOR_0.DESCRIPTION: Built-in estimator implemented in C++. Updates xh_0 vector.

ESTIMATOR_1.DESCRIPTION: User-defined estimator implemented in Python. Updates xh_1 vector.

CONTROLLER_0.DESCRIPTION: Built-in controller implemented in C++. Updates controller_0 vector.

CONTROLLER_1.DESCRIPTION: User-defined controller implemented in Python. Updates controller_1 vector.

IMU_ADC.DESCRIPTION: Handles sensor reads from IMUs and ADC. Updates y vector.

GPS_BAROMETER.DESCRIPTION: Handles sensor reads from the connected GPS and onboard barometer. Updates y vector.

RCIN_SERVO.DESCRIPTION: Handles reads from RC transmitter and sets servo-rail PWM values. Updates rcin and servo vectors.

FLIGHT_MODES.NOTE: Ranges include the lower value, but exclude the upper value. Default mode is manual.

TELEMETRY.DESCRIPTION: Sends basic Mavlink messages via radio connected to UART port.
